task.title: Create a News Article
task.shortdesc: How to create a news article

step.cmd: Sign in to the Drupal website
In the top menu, hover over Content then Add content then News
Confirm that in the Site Section drop-down menu, News is selected

step.info: If you are updating an article, use the Updated Date field

step.cmd: Add a note to the Revision log message on the right side of the page
step.info: Briefly describe what you did to the page

step.cmd: Select Promotion Options on the right side of the page
Check the box next to Promoted to front page to ensure the article appears on the home page of the Tech Help website
To publish the article, check the box next to Published and Save
step.info: To save the article as a draft to publish later, leave the box unchecked and Save
